00030 #include "network.hpp"

00036 namespace network {
00037   namespace client {
00038 
00039     class multi_client : public client_base {
00040     public:
00041       // stream name -> processor sptr
00042       typedef std::string stream_name;
00043       typedef std::multimap<stream_name, processor::base::sptr> processor_id_map;
00044 
00045       // (regex matching stream names, processor type, config)
00046       typedef std::string processor_type;
00047       typedef std::vector<boost::tuple<boost::regex, processor_type, boost::property_tree::ptree> > processor_type_map;
00048 
00049       // stream_name (can be regular expression) -> processor_name
00050       typedef std::string processor_name;
00051       typedef std::multimap<stream_name, processor_name> stream_processor_map;
00052 
00053       // map of results
00054       typedef std::map<std::string, processor::result_base::sptr> result_map;
00055 
00056       // service_mc
00057       class service_mc : public processor::service_base {
00058       public:
00059         typedef boost::shared_ptr<service_mc> sptr;
00060         static sptr make(multi_client* pp,
00061                          processor::service_base::sptr sp) {
00062           return sptr(new service_mc(pp, sp));
00063         }
00064         virtual ~service_mc() {}
00065 
00066         virtual std::string     id()                  const { return sp_->id(); }
00067         virtual ptime           approx_ptime()        const { return sp_->approx_ptime(); }
00068         virtual boost::uint16_t stream_number()       const { return sp_->stream_number(); }
00069         virtual std::string     stream_name()         const { return sp_->stream_name(); }
00070 
00071         virtual void put_result(processor::result_base::sptr rp) {
00072           pp_->put_result(rp);
00073         }
00074         virtual processor::result_base::sptr get_result(std::string name) const {
00075           return pp_->get_result(name);
00076         }
00077 
00078       protected:
00079       private:
00080         service_mc(multi_client* pp,
00081                    processor::service_base::sptr sp)
00082           : pp_(pp)
00083           , sp_(sp) {}
00084 
00085         multi_client* pp_;
00086         const processor::service_base::sptr sp_;
00087       } ;
00088 
00089       //
00090       multi_client(const boost::property_tree::ptree& config)
00091         : client_base(network::get_io_service(), config)
00092         , config_(config) {}
00093       virtual ~multi_client() {}
00094 
00095       bool connect_to(const stream_processor_map& map) {
00096         std::ostringstream stream_names;
00097         BOOST_FOREACH(const stream_processor_map::value_type& p, map)
00098           stream_names << p.first << " ";
00099         if (not client_base::connect_to(stream_names.str()))
00100           return false;
00101         BOOST_FOREACH(const stream_processor_map::value_type& p, map) 
00102           add_processors(p.first, p.second);
00103         return true;
00104       }
00105   
00106       bool connect_to(std::string stream_names,
00107                       std::string processor_name)  {
00108         if (client_base::connect_to(stream_names) == false)
00109           return false;
00110         add_processors(stream_names, processor_name);
00111         return true;
00112       }
00113 
00114       virtual void process(data_buffer_type::const_iterator begin,
00115                            data_buffer_type::const_iterator end) {
00116 
00117         const stream_name str_name(get_directory().stream_name_of(get_header().stream_number()));
00118         std::pair<processor_id_map::iterator, processor_id_map::iterator> range(processor_id_map_.equal_range(str_name));
00119         if (range.first == range.second) {
00120           return; // TODO: complain
00121         }
00122 
00123         // make up service object
00124         processor::service_base::sptr sp(service_mc::make(this, service_net::make(get_header(), get_directory())));
00125         for (; range.first != range.second; ++range.first)
00126           range.first->second->process(sp, begin, end);
00127       }
00128 
00129       virtual processor::result_base::sptr dump(processor::result_base::sptr rp) {
00130         // to be overwritten in a derived class
00131         return rp;
00132       }
00133 
00134       virtual void put_result(processor::result_base::sptr rp) {
00135         //     LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("put_result: %s %s") % rp->name() % rp->to_string()));
00136         result_map_[rp->name()] = dump(rp);
00137       }
00138       virtual processor::result_base::sptr get_result(std::string name) const {
00139         result_map::const_iterator i(result_map_.find(name));
00140         return (i != result_map_.end()) ? i->second : processor::result_base::sptr();
00141       }
00142 
00143     protected:
00144       typedef std::pair<processor_type, boost::property_tree::ptree> pp_type;
00145 
00146       boost::property_tree::ptree::value_type find_ptree_for_processor(std::string processor_name) {
00147         BOOST_FOREACH(const boost::property_tree::ptree::value_type& s, config_.get_child("Clients")) {
00148           if (s.second.get<std::string>("<xmlattr>.proc_name") == processor_name)
00149             return s;
00150         }
00151         throw std::runtime_error(str(boost::format("processor defiinition for '%s' not found") % processor_name));
00152       }
00153 
00154       // add processors with name processor_name for the streams matcing stream_name
00155       void add_processors(std::string stream_names, std::string processor_name) {
00156         const boost::property_tree::ptree::value_type s(find_ptree_for_processor(processor_name));    
00157         std::istringstream iss(stream_names);
00158         std::string stream_name;
00159         while (iss >> stream_name)
00160           processor_type_map_.push_back(boost::make_tuple(boost::regex(stream_name),
00161                                                           s.first,
00162                                                           s.second));
00163       }
00164 
00165       // notifies derived classes of an update of directory
00166       virtual void directory_update(const broadcaster::directory& new_directory) {
00167         // remove processors not present anymore
00168         for (processor_id_map::iterator i(processor_id_map_.begin()); i!=processor_id_map_.end();) {
00169           if (not new_directory.contains(i->first))
00170             processor_id_map_.erase(i++);
00171           else 
00172             ++i;
00173         }
00174         // construct new processors, if needed
00175         for (broadcaster::directory::const_iterator i(new_directory.begin()), iend(new_directory.end()); i!=iend; ++i) {
00176           stream_name str_name(i->first);
00177           // if not found: make new
00178           if (processor_id_map_.find(str_name) != processor_id_map_.end()) continue;
00179           const std::vector<pp_type> ps(find_type_of_stream(str_name));
00180           // p.first : processor name
00181           // p.second: to be used path in ptree config
00182           BOOST_FOREACH(const pp_type& p, ps) {
00183             std::ostringstream oss;
00184             boost::property_tree::write_xml(oss, p.second);
00185             LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("making processor '%s' type='%s' config='%s' ")
00186                          % str_name % p.first % oss.str()));
00187             // when the configuration contains an attribute "type" use this value for constructing the processor
00188             // (used for FFTProcessor only)
00189             std::string type_attr(p.second.get<std::string>("<xmlattr>.type", p.first));
00190             processor_id_map_.insert(std::make_pair(str_name, processor::registry::make(type_attr, p.second)));
00191           }
00192         }
00193       }
00194 
00195       // returns vector of pairs of (processor_type, ptree)
00196       std::vector<pp_type> find_type_of_stream(std::string stream_name) const {
00197         std::vector<pp_type> result;
00198         for (processor_type_map::const_iterator i(processor_type_map_.begin()), end(processor_type_map_.end()); i!=end; ++i) {
00199           if (regex_match(stream_name, i->get<0>()))
00200             result.push_back(std::make_pair(i->get<1>(), i->get<2>()));
00201         }
00202         return result;
00203       }
00204 
00205     private:
00206       const boost::property_tree::ptree config_;   // holds copy of config 
00207 
00208       processor_id_map   processor_id_map_;
00209       processor_type_map processor_type_map_;
00210       result_map         result_map_;
00211     } ;
00212 
00213   } // namespace client
00214 } // namespace network
00215 #endif // _MULTI_CLIENT_HPP_cm121228_
